content: free fanart amigurumi pattern for stitch materials yarn in the colors dark blue medium blue light blue and rose yarn strength dk light worsted number 3 yarn pin-needles stitch markers use a stitch marker in the last stitch of each round moving it up as you go hook 2 5 mm yarn needle scissors stuffing felt light blue or white and black sewing thread white light blue and black - alternatively to white you can use white embroidery yarn optional embroidery needle magic_ring - magic_ring chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slipstitch increase - increase invdec - invisible decrease r - round
